html.p: Definition. Suppose [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline] is a vector space over a field [mathjaxinline]F[/mathjaxinline]. A list of vectors [mathjaxinline]\{ v_1; v_2; \ldots v_ n\}[/mathjaxinline] in [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline] is a basis of [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline] if the list is linearly independent and spans [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline].

Definition. The list [mathjaxinline]\{ e_1; e_2; \ldots e_ n\}[/mathjaxinline] in [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline] is called the standard basis of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline].
